name: Shape Runner (Android Version)
description:
This game was originally made for  DJam #5. The theme is mutation, and the game itself mutates every couple seconds.  I did this as practice for an upcoming game jam as I was not able to code for a couple of months due to schoolwork. Thanks for checking it out!

WARNING: If game is lagging, disable fancy graphics in settings

Github Page (Source Code): https://github.com/IonAir1/shape-runner

Jam Version: https://ironwood.itch.io/shape-runner-jam

Made in Godot 3.2.3 stable https://godotengine.org/

Originally made for DJam #5 https://itch.io/jam/discord-jam-5

DJam submission: https://itch.io/jam/discord-jam-5/rate/873317

Music used from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/ (A bit of hope) and (Retro Platforming)

Sounds are made in JFXR https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com

Fonts used: 

Anniversary by Vladimir Nikolic https://www.dafont.com/anniversary.font

Roboto by Google https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto

This game is licensed under Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/legalcode

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/
